languages.text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each attack that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} them.
languages.original_text: До конца боя {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангард{/g} получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} за каждую атаку, которая в него попала.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the Vanguard gains +<u>(FEL bonus)</u> momentum for each attack that hits them.
Until the end of combat, the Vanguard gains +<u>FEL bonus</u> momentum for each attack that hits them.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя авангард получает +<u>бонус ОБЩ</u> моментума за каждую атаку, которая в него попала.
До конца боя авангард получает +<u>бонус ОБЩ</u> моментума за каждую атаку, которая в него попала.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时都会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each attack that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} them.

traits.locale_text: 每当先锋被{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}时都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}，士气加值等同于先锋的<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} por cada ataque que le {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each attack that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} them.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} por cada ataque que le {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g}.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} für jeden Angriff, von dem sie {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wird.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each attack that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} them.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erlangt die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} für jeden Angriff, von dem sie {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wird.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} pour chaque attaque qui le {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each attack that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} them.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le Patrouilleur bénéficie de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} pour chaque attaque qui le {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は自身に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した攻撃1回につき、+{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each attack that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} them.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了まで、ヴァンガードは自身に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した攻撃1回につき、+<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を得る。
